```{r}
#| echo: false
library(readODS)
library(biblio)

# Reference list
Refs <- read.csv("bib_references.csv")

Bib <- read_bib("../../../../db-dumps/literatur_db/bib/MiguelReferences.bib")
Bib <- subset(Bib, bibtexkey %in% Refs$bibtexkey)

write_bib(Bib, "biblioreferences.bib")
```
